column2: You can freely cast limited use spells
You recover lost health over time
You can no longer take damage
You can no longer be polymorphed
Perk rerolling remains at a fixed price
Remove the red borders when taking damage
Remove the red flashing when low on health
What method to use when sorting spells
Show spell descriptions before picking them up
Highlight spells that need to be fired
Draw the coloured borders around spells
Use the entered seed for the next run
The seed to use for the next run
Labels beneficially stackable perks as truly stackable (affects perk rolling)
Improves perk distribution and removes unique perks from the pool when taken
Show the perk distribution in the Perks tab
Add buttons to the inventory that allows for infinite scrolling
New Copi's Things content will be disabled rather than starting enabled
Replace the spells and wands in the shop with card packs
Show the sum of recently accumulated gold in the log
Show the sum of recently accumulated gold near the player character
Gain 10 frames of invincibility when taking damage from enemies
The amount of invincibility frames you gain when taking damage from enemies
The player character will blink while they are invincible
Heal for the amount gained when your maximum health increases
Heal completely when your maximum health increases
Your projectiles will have reduced cosmetic particle effects
All entities will have reduced cosmetic particle effects
Most of your explosions will no longer stain the environment
Cosmetic particle effects will be completely disabled instead of reduced
Generate 2 random wands at the start of your run
Replace your primary wand with a randomly generated level 1 wand at the start of your run
Replace your secondary wand with a randomly generated level 1 wand at the start of your run
Gain an additional random level 1 wand at the start of your run
Use slightly different custom logic to generate the random starting wands
Randomize the player's cape colour at the start of your run
Randomize the player's max health at the start of your run (from 50 to 150)
Replace any starting flasks with random flasks at the start of your run
Obtain random perks at the start of your run
Obtain random perks at the start of your run
Enemies may spawn as Champions that are stronger and gain a special modifier
Every 50 kills you may encounter a Champion with many modifiers that drops a chest when defeated
Champions may spawn with multiple modifiers
All champions will have at least 4 modifiers
Champion icons are shown above the enemy
Disable automatically opening the inventory if you haven't opened it in the Holy Mountain
A challenge mode where the enemies become stronger and more aggressive
An even harder modifier for Hero Mode
Collecting orbs will increase enemy difficulty while in Hero Mode
Entering new biomes will increase enemy difficulty while in Hero Mode
Allow Copi's Things to override other loadout mod behaviours\nMust be enabled to use multiple loadout mods together\Copi's Things MUST be above other loadout mods in the mods menu!
A quick toggle to disable loadout selection without having to disable all the loadout mods
Apply any custom cape colour the loadout defines
Apply any custom player sprites the loadout defines
If the Selectable Classes mod is enabled, add all loadouts managed by Copi's Things to the class selection area
If the Classy Framework mod is enabled, add all loadouts managed by Copi's Things to the class selection area
If certain loadout spells would be locked, don't lock them
Your wands will recharge while holstered
Allow Unique Wands to rarely appear in place of normal wands
Any applicable spell can spawn on any generated wand regardless of the wand level
Allow spells that usually do not spawn on wands to spawn on wands
Replace all spells on all generated wands with completely random spells
Wands will be generated using different logic
Replace the preset wands from the first biome with procedural level 1 wands
Add health bars to enemies that have taken damage
Add health bars to enemies that have taken damage
Draw the health bars using sprites which is heavier on performance
Gold nuggets will decay into gold powder instead of disappearing completely
Collect all gold nuggets on the map
Nearby gold nuggets will be merged into one to reduce physics load
Add an FPS counter to the screen
Show challenge modes as icons on the right side of the screen
Show entity names when targeting them
Show perk descriptions when targeting them
Show persistent damage numbers over enemies
Hide the Copi's Things button in the top right after 5 seconds of menu inactivity
Force the boss to spawn at a certain orb difficulty
Player projectiles will be random colours
Alt-fire to swap between two different item hotbars
Chests and Super Chests have a chance to drop a perk instead
Allow Copi's Things to disable actions and perks from the base game and other mods
Show tips about Copi's Things at the start of each run
You can disable these tips in the Copi's Things options menu.
Check out all the options! There may be something you're interested in that you didn't hear about.
Enabling Manage External Content allows Copi's Things to manage vanilla content and content added by other mods.
If hundreds of damage numbers are making you lag, try the Show Damage Numbers option in Copi's Things!
If you play a lot of New Game++ and beyond, consider enabling Combine Gold to reduce lag.
Don't like spell shops? Enable Wand Shops Only in the Game Modifiers tab!
If your wand causes a lot of lag, consider temporarily disabling particles on Options Page 2.
Want to know what Perks do before you pick them up? Enable Show Perk Descriptions on Options Page 2.
If Steam keeps Noita from closing, disable cloud sync!
Add a target dummy useful for testing spells and damage to each Holy Mountain
Allows the tracker to include environmental and untracked damage
Spawn a normal target dummy where you stand
Spawn a boss target dummy where you stand
Add a spell slot machine to each Holy Mountain
Add a shop reroller to each Holy Mountain
Keep the player in the center of the screen (brightens game)
Keep the player in the center of the screen (requires restart)
Enable random events during gameplay (work in progress)
Enables some features useful for developing Copi's Things
Allow the toggling of content that was removed from Copi's Things\n(This content may not work and could cause issues)
Allow the config menu to remain visible while the inventory is open
